PRIME.title: PRIME / Possession Game System
PRIME.prime_description_end: Endurance marks how tough you are, how long you can keep going and how long you're likely to keep you entrails from becoming your extrails.
PRIME.prime_description_itr: Intricate measures how well your abile to make fine adjustments and apply carefully measured amounts of force. For example, origami. Unless it's people origami.
PRIME.prime_description_mov: Manoeuvre is your ability to duck, dodge and weave. The 'weaving through crowds' weaving as opposed to actual weaving, that's Intricate.
PRIME.prime_description_str: Strength is the sum of the raw physical force you're able to generate and apply to a problem. If it doesn't solve it, you aren't using enough of it.
PRIME.prime_description_int: Intellect defines your ability to process, recall, hypothesise and comprehend about given subject you're familiar with. Or on occassion, ones you aren't.
PRIME.prime_description_man: Manipulation is your innate abilty to persuade those around you and understand the social world. A favourite of charismatic wannabe dictators everywhere.
PRIME.prime_description_per: Perception outlines your ability to sense the world around you. Whether you wanted to or not...
PRIME.prime_description_res: Resolve is a measure of how strong your mind is. And how clean your undergarments.
PRIME.prime_description_att: Attune marks your ability to manipulate the arcane, an entirely risk free activity.
PRIME.prime_description_por: Portent is your inner demon. God put them there. They're your friend. Probably.
PRIME.refinment_description_animal: Animal - Bacon ipsum dolor amet sirloin pork belly tenderloin, pig t-bone pork chop tongue short loin porchetta jowl chuck.

PRIME.diceRoller.title: Prime Dice
PRIME.diceRoller.help: Select a Prime, a Prime + Refinement, add a base value or simply press Roll!
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_flexib: This weapon is hard to Parry or Block (-2) and is hard to use to Parry (-2)
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_pole: Gains +2 to Set to Recieve Reaction
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_ranked: Weapon can be used for ranked fighting
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_minimu: Weapon can only be used at more distant targets (not target next to you)
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_weak: If an attack fails by 5 or more steps, the weapon is damaged and can only be used to parry until repaired
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_heavy: Must have Strength Prime of 4 or higher OR relevant perk.
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_penetr: Reduces armour protection by one per rank
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_devast: Counts as two wounds towards Wound Limit, often linked to another wound type, e.g. Devastating Bleeding
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_versat: Choose Strength or Manoeuvre as Prime
PRIME.weapon_keywords_description_cumber: Attacks with this weapon cost +1 AP
PRIME.weapon_action_description_cleave: This weapon can be swung for more damage (+1 DR)
PRIME.weapon_action_description_bash: Target loses 2 Action Points if Resilience damage caused
PRIME.weapon_action_description_surpress: Restricts targets movement within a given area. (tbc)
PRIME.weapon_action_description_lob: Fires in an arc over cover and stuff. (tbc)
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_ablativ: If the armour's resilience is used to defend against damage, it is always reduced. This is the case for even a normal attack, unless the weapon is explicetly incapable of armour damage.
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_cumbers: Increases the cost of any actions involving moving across the battlefield by +1 AP.
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_restric: Adds +2 to the difficulty of any actions involving the Intricate or Manoeuvre Primes.
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_camoufl: In the appropriate setting, this armour grants a +1 to attempts to hide from sight.
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_silent: The armour is unusally silent and adds +1 to attempts to move silently.
PRIME.armour_keyword_description_sense_d: Adds +2 to the difficulty of any actions involving the Perception Prime.
PRIME.armour_untrained_penalities_descri: This armour adds +1 AP cost to all major actions if the wearer isn't properly trained.
This armour adds +2 AP cost to all major actions if the wearer isn't properly trained.
This armour adds +3 AP cost to all major actions if the wearer isn't properly trained.
This armour adds +4 AP cost to all major actions if the wearer isn't properly trained.
PRIME.perk_actor_stat_bonus_base_ap_bonu: Action points at start of combat
PRIME.actor_wound_condition_description_: Every time a Bane (natural 1) is rolled to perform an action lose 1 Resilience
Every time a Bane (natural 1) is rolled to perform an action suffer a wound (max 1 wound per roll)
Counts towards Wound Limit, but character falls unconscious instead of starting to die if Wound Limit reached.
You no longer recieve the first Reaction for free each tic
Lowers maximum Resilience by 1 for each Battered wound condition
You must act last in a combat phase
PRIME.actor_mental_condition_description: Mad, mad mad I tell you!
PRIME.action_type_major_description: Only one major action per tick
PRIME.action_type_minor_description: No limit to how may times the action can be used in a tick
PRIME.action_type_reaction_description: Can be used in response to other actions with no limit to number of uses
PRIME.action_type_combo_description: Must be used in combination with a major action
